references.paper_title: Realtime multi-person 2d pose estimation using part affinity fields
references.reason: This paper is foundational for the realtime multi-person pose estimation techniques used in this paper's method.

references.paper_title: 2d human pose estimation: New benchmark and state of the art analysis
references.reason: This paper is among the most highly cited foundational works for human pose estimation techniques and datasets.

references.paper_title: Microsoft coco: Common objects in context
references.reason: This paper presents the MS COCO dataset, which is the basis for the RefHuman dataset used in the paper.

references.paper_title: Group pose: A simple baseline for end-to-end multi-person pose estimation
references.reason: This paper is a very recent state-of-the-art approach for multi-person pose estimation, which the current paper uses for comparison and integration.

references.paper_title: End-to-end multi-person pose estimation with transformers
references.reason: This paper provides a highly influential transformer-based approach for pose estimation, which is the basis of the current paper's approach.
